channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT

item.title: Report X-2024110538
item.description:
Report X-2024110538

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-18T12:24:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-13
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Two points of the Ltd Qty label printed on the carton can be seen protruding from behind the shipper's barcode label. Pkg contained 6 x 13 oz. metal aerosol can of spray paint according to labeling on carton and info provided on shipping label/invoice. Perforations around bottom closure edges ripped allowing the contents to fall out. If found, these contents will be repacked as prescribed for pressurized receptacles.

item.title: Report X-2024110539
item.description:
Report X-2024110539

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-18T12:24:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-13
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: No Hazmat markings on carton indicating contents as Aerosols or Flammable Liquid (Ltd Qty). Non hazardous contents leaked wetting the carton causing to rip and contents to fall out exposing the hazardous contents of the unmarked pkg. Pressurized contents will be repacked as prescribed.
